# tf.contrib.eager.set_execution_mode

``` python
tf.contrib.eager.set_execution_mode(mode)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/eager/context.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/python/eager/context.py).

Sets execution mode for the current thread.
